title: Darcrus Reaches 24-Hour Volume of $0.00 (DAR)
content: Darcrus (CURRENCY:DAR) traded 14.1% lower against the US dollar during the 24-hour period ending at 17:00 PM E.T. on June 2nd. One Darcrus token can now be purchased for approximately $0.11 or 0.00001479 BTC on exchanges. Darcrus has a total market capitalization of $1.54 million and $0.00 worth of Darcrus was traded on exchanges in the last 24 hours. Over the last week, Darcrus has traded down 14.8% against the US dollar.    Here’s how other cryptocurrencies have performed over the last 24 hours:    Ripple (XRP) traded 4.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.64 or 0.00008407 BTC.  Stellar (XLM) traded up 4.2% against the dollar and now trades at $0.30 or 0.00003914 BTC.  IOTA (MIOTA) traded 0.9% higher against the dollar and now trades at $1.89 or 0.00024749 BTC.  TRON (TRX) traded 5.3% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.0610 or 0.00000799 BTC.  NEO (NEO) traded 3.8% higher against the dollar and now trades at $56.56 or 0.00740923 BTC.  Tether (USDT) traded 1.1% lower against the dollar and now trades at $0.99 or 0.00012957 BTC.  VeChain (VEN) traded up 9.5% against the dollar and now trades at $3.72 or 0.00048676 BTC.  Binance Coin (BNB) traded up 4.8% against the dollar and now trades at $14.71 or 0.00192636 BTC.  Ontology (ONT) traded up 10.4% against the dollar and now trades at $7.77 or 0.00101838 BTC.  Zilliqa (ZIL) traded 7.7% higher against the dollar and now trades at $0.12 or 0.00001554 BTC.   About Darcrus     Darcrus launched on December 12th, 2016. Darcrus’ total supply is 13,600,388 tokens. Darcrus’ official website is darcr.us . Darcrus’ official Twitter account is @darcrus .  Buying and Selling Darcrus    Darcrus can be bought or sold on the following cryptocurrency exchanges: Waves Decentralized Exchange. It is usually not currently possible to purchase alternative cryptocurrencies such as Darcrus directly using U.S. dollars. Investors seeking to trade Darcrus should first purchase Bitcoin or Ethereum using an exchange that deals in U.S. dollars such as Gemini, GDAX or Coinbase . Investors can then use their newly-acquired Bitcoin or Ethereum to purchase Darcrus using one of the exchanges listed above.
